00036 /* Creation flags */
00037 #define XNDREORD 0x00000001     /* Don't reorder pend queues upon prio change */
00038 
00039 /* Pod status flags */
00040 #define XNRPRIO  0x00000002     /* Reverse priority scheme */
00041 #define XNTIMED  0x00000004     /* Timer started */
00042 #define XNTMSET  0x00000008     /* Pod time has been set */
00043 #define XNTMPER  0x00000010     /* Periodic timing */
00044 #define XNFATAL  0x00000020     /* Pod encountered a fatal error */
00045 #define XNPIDLE  0x00000040     /* Pod is unavailable (initializing/shutting down) */
00046 
00047 /* Sched status flags */
00048 #define XNKCOUT      0x80000000 /* Sched callout context */
00049 #define XNHTICK      0x40000000 /* Host tick pending  */
00050 
00051 /* These flags are available to the real-time interfaces */
00052 #define XNPOD_SPARE0  0x01000000
00053 #define XNPOD_SPARE1  0x02000000
00054 #define XNPOD_SPARE2  0x04000000
00055 #define XNPOD_SPARE3  0x08000000
00056 #define XNPOD_SPARE4  0x10000000
00057 #define XNPOD_SPARE5  0x20000000
00058 #define XNPOD_SPARE6  0x40000000
00059 #define XNPOD_SPARE7  0x80000000
00060 
00061 /* Flags for context checking */
00062 #define XNPOD_THREAD_CONTEXT     0x1 /* Regular thread */
00063 #define XNPOD_INTERRUPT_CONTEXT  0x2 /* Interrupt service thread */
00064 #define XNPOD_HOOK_CONTEXT       0x4 /* Nanokernel hook */
00065 #define XNPOD_ROOT_CONTEXT       0x8 /* Root thread */
00066 
00067 #define XNPOD_NORMAL_EXIT  0x0
00068 #define XNPOD_FATAL_EXIT   0x1
00069 
00070 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICK         XNARCH_DEFAULT_TICK
00071 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICKHANDLER  (&xnpod_announce_tick)
00072 
00073 #define XNPOD_ALL_CPUS  XNARCH_CPU_MASK_ALL
00074 
00075 #define XNPOD_HEAPSIZE  (CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_SYS_HEAPSZ * 1024)
00076 #define XNPOD_PAGESIZE  512
00077 #define XNPOD_RUNPRIO   0x80000000 /* Placeholder for "stdthread priority" */
00078 
00079 /* Flags for xnpod_schedule_runnable() */
00080 #define XNPOD_SCHEDFIFO 0x0
00081 #define XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO 0x1
00082 #define XNPOD_NOSWITCH  0x2
00083 
00084 /* Normal root thread priority == min_std_prio - 1 */
00085 #define XNPOD_ROOT_PRIO_BASE   ((nkpod)->root_prio_base)

00141 #define xnsched_cpu(__sched__) \
00142     ((__sched__) - &nkpod->sched[0])
00143 
00144 #define xnsched_resched_mask() \
00145     (xnpod_current_sched()->resched)
00146 
00147 #define xnsched_resched_p()                     \
00148     (!xnarch_cpus_empty(xnsched_resched_mask()))
00149 
00150 #define xnsched_tst_resched(__sched__) \
00151     xnarch_cpu_isset(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())
00152 
00153 #define xnsched_set_resched(__sched__) \
00154     xnarch_cpu_set(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())
00155 
00156 #define xnsched_clr_resched(__sched__) \
00157     xnarch_cpu_clear(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())
00158 
00159 #define xnsched_clr_mask(__sched__) \
00160     xnarch_cpus_clear((__sched__)->resched)

00261     nkpod->watchdog_armed = 0;

00269 static inline int xnpod_get_qdir (xnpod_t *pod)
00270 {
00271     /* Returns the queuing direction of threads for a given pod */
00272     return testbits(pod->status,XNRPRIO) ? xnqueue_up : xnqueue_down;
00273 }
00274 
00275 static inline int xnpod_get_minprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00276 {
00277     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00278         pod->minpri + incr :
00279         pod->minpri - incr;
00280 }
00281 
00282 static inline int xnpod_get_maxprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00283 {
00284     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00285         pod->maxpri - incr :
00286         pod->maxpri + incr;
00287 }
00288 
00289 static inline int xnpod_priocompare (int inprio, int outprio)
00290 {
00291     /* Returns a negative, null or positive value whether inprio is
00292        lower than, equal to or greater than outprio. */
00293     int delta = inprio - outprio;
00294     return testbits(nkpod->status,XNRPRIO) ? -delta : delta;
00295 }
00296 
00297 static inline void xnpod_renice_root (int prio)
00298 
00299 {
00300     xnthread_t *rootcb;
00301     spl_t s;
00302 
00303     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00304     rootcb = &nkpod->sched[xnarch_current_cpu()].rootcb;
00305     rootcb->cprio = prio;
00306     xnpod_schedule_runnable(rootcb,XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO|XNPOD_NOSWITCH);
00307     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00308 }

00310     /* -- Beginning of the exported interface */

00312 #define xnpod_sched_slot(cpu) \
00313     (&nkpod->sched[cpu])
00314 
00315 #define xnpod_current_sched() \
00316     xnpod_sched_slot(xnarch_current_cpu())
00317 
00318 #define xnpod_interrupt_p() \
00319     (xnpod_current_sched()->inesting > 0)
00320 
00321 #define xnpod_callout_p() \
00322     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_sched()->status,XNKCOUT))
00323 
00324 #define xnpod_asynch_p() \
00325     (xnpod_interrupt_p() || xnpod_callout_p())
00326 
00327 #define xnpod_current_thread() \
00328     (xnpod_current_sched()->runthread)
00329 
00330 #define xnpod_current_root() \
00331     (&xnpod_current_sched()->rootcb)
00332 
00333 #define xnpod_current_p(thread) \
00334     (xnpod_current_thread() == (thread))
00335 
00336 #define xnpod_locked_p() \
00337     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK))
00338 
00339 #define xnpod_unblockable_p() \
00340     (xnpod_asynch_p() || testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK|XNROOT))
00341 
00342 #define xnpod_root_p() \
00343     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT))
00344 
00345 #define xnpod_shadow_p() \
00346     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNSHADOW))
00347 
00348 #define xnpod_userspace_p() \
00349     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT|XNSHADOW))
00350 
00351 #define xnpod_primary_p() \
00352     (!(xnpod_asynch_p() || xnpod_root_p()))
00353 
00354 #define xnpod_secondary_p() \
00355     (xnpod_root_p())
00356 
00357 #define xnpod_idle_p() xnpod_root_p()
00358 
00359 #define xnpod_timeset_p() \
00360     (!!testbits(nkpod->status,XNTMSET))

00362 static inline u_long xnpod_get_ticks2sec (void) {
00363     return nkpod->ticks2sec;
00364 }
00365 
00366 static inline u_long xnpod_get_tickval (void) {
00367     /* Returns the duration of a tick in nanoseconds */
00368     return nkpod->tickvalue;
00369 }
00370 
00371 static inline xntime_t xnpod_ticks2ns (xnticks_t ticks) {
00372     /* Convert a count of ticks in nanoseconds */
00373     return ticks * xnpod_get_tickval();
00374 }
00375 
00376 static inline xnticks_t xnpod_ns2ticks (xntime_t t) {
00377     return xnarch_ulldiv(t,xnpod_get_tickval(),NULL);
00378 }

00432 static inline void xnpod_lock_sched (void) {
00433 
00434     /* Don't swap these two lines... */
00435     xnarch_atomic_inc(&nkpod->schedlck);
00436     __setbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00437 }
00438 
00439 static inline void xnpod_unlock_sched (void) {
00440 
00441     if (xnarch_atomic_dec_and_test(&nkpod->schedlck))
00442         {
00443         __clrbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00444         xnpod_schedule();
00445         }
00446 }

00476 static inline void xnpod_yield (void) {
00477     xnpod_resume_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),0);
00478     xnpod_schedule();
00479 }

00481 static inline void xnpod_delay (xnticks_t timeout) {
00482     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNDELAY,timeout,NULL);
00483 }

00485 static inline void xnpod_suspend_self (void) {

00489 static inline void xnpod_delete_self (void) {
